title: Demand For Electric Vehicles From BMW & Mercedes Higher Than Expected
description:
Electric cars are enjoying a sales surge in Europe, outselling gas-powered cars for the first time in December of 2025.

The post Demand For Electric Vehicles From BMW & Mercedes Higher Than Expected appeared first on CleanTechnica.
